job.title: Azure Data Engineer
job.description: Our Client is looking for an "Azure Data Engineer"Â for contract positions. Please review the Job descriptions below and let us know if you areÂ interested and fit for any of the jobs.Â Please apply at ravinder@vsvwins.com, 510 560 4649 // raghav@vsvwins.com, 302 648 1257Job Description:Project Duration: 12-month contract with a chance to extendProject Location: Richmond, VA (Can be Remote)It's a W2/1099 Position.Technical MUST haves:Â Pyspark/Python, writing streaming applications into a production Enterprise environment.Rest API Design and DevelopmentAzure Data Bricks, Configuration, Notebooks development, and Delta Tables processingSQL in AzureMicrosoft Azureâ¢ Logic Appâ¢ Function Appsâ¢ Resource Managementâ¢ Agile Delivery FrameworkProven experience with Agile and Waterfall SDLC methodologies.Excellent systems requirement documentation skillsProven ability to deliver results.Nice to Have Experience:Experience with Continuous Integration Continuous Development (CICD) is a plusExperience with Test-Driven Development (TDD) is a plusRoles and Responsibilities:Follows direction set by the ETL Development Lead when developing ETL solutions.Works with Systems Analysts in designing, testing, and implementing ETL solutions.Works as part of a larger development team that includes other internal and external ETL developers.Responsible for the development, testing, and maintenance of ETL solutions.Participates in unit testing and data quality efforts within assigned data domain.Creates and maintains appropriate documentation.Must be able to troubleshoot and identify the root cause of production issues.Demonstrate detailed knowledge of legacy systems, Atlas systems, data structures/usage and primary systems interfaces based on appropriately written system specifications.If you are interested or have references please apply at ravinder@vsvwins.com, 510 560 4649 // raghav@vsvwins.com, 302 648 1257.Regards,Ravi ChandelVSVWINS INC.
